[

{title, "Fade Action"},

{see_also, [base, appear]},

{usage, "
	wf:wire(myDiv, #fade { speed=500 })
"},


{description, "
	Call JQuery's <a href='http://docs.jquery.com/Effects/fadeOut'>fadeOut(speed)</a> on the target element.
"},

{attributes, [
	{"speed", "integer", "Speed of the effect, in milliseconds."}
]}

].
